general_advisory: Groundnut crop is in flowering stage, apply Gypsum 200 kg per acre. In onion crop, perform interculture and hand weeding at 15-20 days after transplanting. Apply specific fertilizers as recommended.

advisory: To manage the carrier of Bud necrosis disease (Thrips) during primary stage, spray Neem Based Pesticide (Azadirachtin) 1500 PPM. To manage Thrips chemically, use Thiamethoxam 25% W.G or other recommended chemicals.
To manage purple blotch and Stemphylium leaf blight disease, spray specific fungicides at recommended intervals.
Apply 35 kg Urea per acre at 3 weeks after transplantation for high yielding varieties. Control Yellow Stem Borer using recommended pesticides.
Plant Sugarcane crop with recommended fungicides. Manage sett rot disease post-planting.
To control Bihar hairy caterpillar, spray Chlorpyriphos 50% + Cypermethrin 5 % E.C. in the evening.
To control Bihar hairy caterpillar, spray Chlorpyriphos 50% + Cypermethrin 5 % E.C. in the evening.
Manage little leaf disease with recommended chemicals for leafhoppers.
To control cutworm, spray Chlorpyriphos 50% + Cypermethrin 5 % E.C. in the evening.
To manage mango hoppers, spray recommended insecticides at specific intervals. Application of smoke can also help reduce pest population.
For countering Foot and mouth diseases of cattle, ensure FMD vaccination once a year.
Vaccinate chicks with Lasota at 7 days and with IBD vaccines within 13-15 days to prevent sleeping disease.
